title: R Package for Interfacing EPANET
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.epanet in R install.packages('kwb.epanet')  # Browse the kwb.epanet manual pages help(package = 'kwb.epanet')

title: Calculate Specific Energy Demand — calculateSpecificEnergyDemand
text: Calculate Specific Energy Demand

title: Calculate Specific Energy Demand — calculateSpecificEnergyDemand
code: calculateSpecificEnergyDemand(   waterDemand,   totalEnergy,   COLNAMES = list(Q = "Q.m3.per.hour.sum", E = "Kw.hr.per.m3.avg", Eff =     "Average.Efficiency.avg") )

title: Calculate Specific Energy Demand — calculateSpecificEnergyDemand
text: waterDemand minimum constraint water demand totalEnergy list element "energyTotal", retrieved runOptimisationStrategy COLNAMES list elements Q, E, Eff, corresponding discharge, energy demand efficiency, respectively. Default: list(Q = "Q.m3.per.hour.sum", E = "Kw.hr.per.m3.avg", Eff = "Average.Efficiency.avg")

title: Calculate Specific Energy Demand — calculateSpecificEnergyDemand
text: list elements Q, E, Eff, holding column names totalEnergy, corresponding discharge, energy demand efficiency, respectively. Default: list(Q = "Q.m3.per.hour.sum", E = "Kw.hr.per.m3.avg", Eff = "Average.Efficiency.avg")

title: Calibrate Model — calibrateModel
text: Calibrate Model

title: Calibrate Model — calibrateModel
code: calibrateModel(   configuration,   pipeIDs = NULL,   measured,   pumpsToCalibrate = NULL,   parameterName = "Diameter",   parameterRange,   showLivePlot = TRUE,   ... )

title: Calibrate Model — calibrateModel
text: configuration EPANET parameterisation, e.g. retrieved readEpanetInputFile() pipeIDs regular expression name pipeID(s) used calibration measured measurement data pumps data.frame e.g. data.frame(pumpNames=c("pmpW1", "pmpW2"), measuredQ=c(140,190)) pumpsToCalibrate regular expression name pumps used calibration: e.g. "pmpW1" parameterName name ONE EPANET pipe parameters calibrated: e.g. Diameter Roughness parameterRange min/max range possible calibration parameter values: 0-1; parameterRange*cun = newParameterValue, e.g. parameter range = 0.5 -> 50% reduction initial value parameterName pipeIDs defined calibrateModel() showLivePlot current calibration status plotted showLivePlot=TRUE. Default: TRUE ... additional parameters passed fitnessAdaptedModelConfiguration()

title: Plot Model — plotModel
text: plot EPANET model network. Allows plotting changed pipe ids, defined vector parameter "changedPipeIDs"

title: Plot Model — plotModel
code: plotModel(   inpdat,   pch = 16,   cex = 0.2,   xlab = "",   ylab = "",   main = defaultMain(inpdat, 1),   zoomToPumps = FALSE,   changedPipeIDs = NULL,   ... )

title: Plot Model — plotModel
text: inpdat EPANET input file pch Either integer specifying symbol single character used default plotting points. See points possible values interpretation (default: 16) cex numerical value giving amount plotting text symbols magnified relative default. starts 1 device opened, reset layout changed, e.g. setting mfrow. (default: 0.2) xlab title x axis (default: "") ylab title y axis (default: "") main overall title plot (default: kwb.epanet:::defaultMain(inpdat, 1)) zoomToPumps plot zoomed pumps (default: FALSE) changedPipeIDs optional, vector changed pipe IDs (default: NULL) ... additional arguments passed plot

title: Report Energy Use — reportEnergyUse

title: Report Variable Definition — reportVariable
text: Report variable definition argument variables setReportOptions

title: Report Variable Definition — reportVariable
code: reportVariable(   name = "Elevation",   yes = TRUE,   below = NA,   above = NA,   precision = 2 )

title: Report Variable Definition — reportVariable
text: name name variable. Node variables can reported include: "Elevation", "Demand", "Head", "Pressure", "Quality". Link variables include: "Length", "Diameter", "Flow", "Velocity", "Headloss", "LinkQuality", "LinkStatus", "Setting" (Roughness pipes, speed pumps,,  pressure/flow setting valves), "Reaction" (reaction rate), "FFactor" (friction factor) yes shall variable importet ? set non-NA value (default: NA) values given value reported set non-NA value (default: NA) values given value reported precision variable reported given precision (number decimal places). Default: 2

title: Run EPANET With Given Input File — runEpanet
text: inpfile full path EPANET input file returnOutput TRUE, output read generated output file returned epanet.dir path EPANET installation directory. Default: getEpanetInstallationPath() intern logical, indicates whether make output command R object. write.output TRUE, EPANET write binary output file, else ... arguments passed readEpanetOutputFile, : read.prolog, read.energyUse, read.dynamicResults, read.epilog, see . dbg TRUE, debug messages shown. Default: FALSE

title: Run EPANET INP configuration — runEpanetConfiguration
text: inpdat input data retrieved readEpanetInputFile name name input file generated tempdir() returnOutput TRUE, output read output file (generated, see write.output) returned. Default: value write.output write.output TRUE, EPANET write binary output file, else ... arguments passed runEpanet finally readEpanetOutputFile, : read.prolog, read.energyUse, read.dynamicResults, read.epilog, see . dbg TRUE, debug messages shown. Default: FALSE

title: Run Optimisation Strategy — runOptimisationStrategy
text: configuration EPANET configuration, representing EPANET input file, returned readEpanetInputFile newCurvesData list elements Pump (data frame columns "ID", "X_VALUE" "Y_VALUE") pump curves, GlobalPumpEfficiency (data frame columns "ID", "X_VALUE" "Y_VALUE") sublist PumpNamePrefix (elements PumpCurves = "TDH"  GlobalPumpEfficiency = "Eff" ) optimisationStrategy list elements name (name optimisation strategy), shortName (short name optimisation strategy) pumpsToReplace (vector pump-ids replaced, none: "") operationSchemes possible wellfield operation schemes. Default: wellFieldOperationSchemes(getNamesOfPumps(configuration)) showLivePlot (default: FALSE)

title: Run Optimisation Strategy — runOptimisationStrategy
text: list elements energyTotal energyPerPump

title: Set Epanet Installation Path — setEpanetInstallationPath
text: Set Epanet Installation Path

title: Set Epanet Installation Path — setEpanetInstallationPath
text: epanet.dir full path MS Access database ODBC database name

what: Set REPORT Option in EPANET configuration — setReportOptions
title: Set REPORT Option in EPANET configuration — setReportOptions
text: Set REPORT Option EPANET configuration

title: Set REPORT Option in EPANET configuration — setReportOptions
code: setReportOptions(   configuration,   pagesize = 0,   file = "",   status = "NO",   summary = "YES",   messages = "YES",   energy = "NO",   nodes = "NONE",   links = "NONE",   variables = defaultReportVariables() )

title: Set REPORT Option in EPANET configuration — setReportOptions
text: configuration EPANET configuration, representing EPANET input file, returned readEpanetInputFile pagesize pagesize sets number lines written per page output report. default 0, meaning line limit per page effect. file file supplies name file output report written. file name contains spaces must surrounded double quotes. supplied Report file, specified second parameter ENopen (ENepanet) function used. status status determines whether hydraulic status messages written Report file. YES selected messages identify network components change status time step simulation. FULL selected, convergence information also included trial hydraulic analysis. level detail useful de-bugging networks become hydraulically unbalanced. default . summary summary determines whether summary table number network components key analysis options generated. default YES. messages messages determines whether error warning messages generated hydraulic/water quality analysis written Report file. default YES. energy energy determines table reporting average energy usage cost pump provided. default . nodes nodes identifies nodes reported . can either list individual node ID labels use keywords NONE . Additional NODES lines can used continue list. default NONE. links links identifies links reported . can either list individual link ID labels use keywords NONE . Additional LINKS lines can used continue list. default NONE. variables list report variables defined reportVariable, e.g. list(reportVariable(name = "VELOCITY", = 3.0, precision = 4), reportVariable(name = "F-FACTOR", precision = 4)). Default: defaultReportVariables

what: Set EPANET' Time-Related Simulation Parameters — setTimeParameter

title: Set EPANET' Time-Related Simulation Parameters — setTimeParameter
text: configuration EPANET configuration, representing EPANET input file, returned readEpanetInputFile duration (default: "") hydraulic.timestep (default: "") quality.timestep (default: "") rule.timestep (default: "") pattern.timestep (default: "") pattern.start (default: "") report.timestep (default: "") report.start (default: "") start.clocktime (default: "") statistic (default: "")

title: Set EPANET' Time-Related Simulation Parameters — setTimeParameter
text: return configuration modified [TIMES] parameterisation
